com.planbase.pdf.layoutmanager

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.planbase.pdf.layoutmanager.Cell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class Cell
extends Object
implements Renderable
    A styled table cell or layout block with a pre-set horizontal width. Vertical height is calculated based on how the content is rendered with regard to line-breaks and page-breaks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Cell.Builder
      A mutable Builder for somewhat less mutable cells.

        public static Cell of(CellStyle cs,
                      float w)
        Creates a new cell.
        Parameters:
        w - the width (height will be calculated based on how objects can be rendered within this width).
        cs - the cell style
        Returns:
        a cell suitable for rendering.

      • calcDimensions

        public XyDim calcDimensions(float maxWidth)
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        Given a width, returns the height and actual width after line wrapping. If line wrapping is not needed, just returns the static width and height. If calculations are done, the results should be cached because render() will likely be called with the same width (or at least one previously given widths).
        Specified by:
        calcDimensions in interface Renderable

      • render

        public XyOffset render(LogicalPage lp,
                       XyOffset outerTopLeft,
                       XyDim outerDimensions,
                       boolean allPages)
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        Only call this with a maxWidth that you have previously passed to calcDimensions. Renders item and all child-items with given width and returns the x-y pair of the lower-right-hand corner of the last line (e.g. of text).
        Specified by:
        render in interface Renderable
